changeSet.author: LuZhen
changeSet.sql: alter table t_purchase_quotation add quotation_application_id int(11) Null; alter table t_purchase_quotation add total_price double Null;

changeSet.author: LuZhen
changeSet.sql: alter table t_purchase_quotation add op_name varchar(255) Null; alter table t_purchase_quotation add surveyor_name varchar(155) Null;

changeSet.author: WangShun
changeSet.sql: alter table t_purchase_quotation CHANGE public_status public_status int (4); alter table t_purchase_quotation CHANGE select_status select_status int (4);

changeSet.author: WangShun
changeSet.sql: alter table t_surveyor ADD COLUMN `ship_type` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '可验船型';

changeSet.author: LuZhen
changeSet.sql: alter table t_inspection_report drop column purchase_inspection_id

changeSet.author: LuZhen
changeSet.sql: alter table t_inspection_report change column t_inspection_reportcol inspection_reportcol varchar(155) NULL;

changeSet.author: LuZhen
changeSet.sql: alter table t_media modify column file_url varchar(255) NULL;

changeSet.author: LuZhen
WangShun
changeSet.sql: alter table t_surveyor_experience CHANGE time start_date Date COMMENT '工作起始日期'; alter table t_surveyor_experience ADD COLUMN end_date Date COMMENT '工作结束日期';

changeSet.author: WangShun
changeSet.sql: alter table t_surveyor_experience CHANGE work_contant work_content varchar(255);

changeSet.author: WangShun
changeSet.sql: alter table t_surveyor_experience CHANGE surveyor_id surveyor_id int(11);

changeSet.author: WangShun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `sys_message` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sender` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '消息发出方', `receiver` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '消息接收方', `title` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '标题', `content` text COMMENT '内容', `read_status` int(4) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '阅读状态', `read_date` date DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '阅读日期', `top_time` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '置顶时间秒数', `create_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `create_by` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `update_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `update_by` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `del_flag` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: WangShun
changeSet.sql: alter table sys_message CHANGE top_time top_time varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '置顶时间';

changeSet.author: WangShun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `t_comment` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `op_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `op_grade` double DEFAULT NULL, `op_comment` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `surveyor_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `surveyor_grade` double DEFAULT NULL, `surveyor_comment` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `company_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `pro_type` int(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '系统类型(1:量油 2:买卖船)', `inspection_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `create_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `create_by` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `update_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `update_by` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `del_flag` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: LuZhen
changeSet.sql: alter table t_purchase_inspection add submit_status int(11) Null;

changeSet.author: LuZhen
